greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = k-1, where k is smallest number such that A002487(k) = n.
example: A002487(33) = 6 and this is the first time 6 appears, so a(6) = 33-1 = 32.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_
ext: Corrected and extended by _David W. Wilson_
